name: Super Plinko
description:
Guess how much potential a little ball can have?

A fun and interesting balls game, with a little luck and skill!

How to play:
-Tap the screen and choose the right angle to throw the balls
-When the balls fall into the slots, you can get rewards
-When the balls fall into all slots and light up all lights, you can get more rewards

Game features:
-Simple operation, anyone can get started right away
-The rewards of the slot machine are so rich
-Relaxing game maps to relieve your stress

This is completely free and no in-game purchase! Download now and see how much reward you can get? !
